page.title: 15LOCAL SHOPS,FARNBOROUGH
page.content:
We have done a survey of the{local {shops.}These are the shops that are in the immediate area - Les's Greengrocer & General Store, Chemist, Wavyline supermarket, N.S.S. (Newsagent), Butchers, Fish & Chip Shop, Laundrette, County Kitchens.
We asked people in the shopping area if they were satisfied with local shopping facilities. These are the results of our survey - { {23}people shop locally. {12}people don't shop locally. {19}people thought the local shops were inadeqaute. {14}people thought the shops were adeqaute. People said that they would like a Sainsbury's Supermarket,clothes shops, a bakery, a drapers and a DIY shop.
